hero.title:
Building {tech} that
understands emotions
hero.description: HUA Labs is a company that researches and develops interfaces that understand and empathize with user emotions. We create better digital experiences through the balance of technology and emotion.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to understand people's emotions through technology and provide warmer digital experiences based on that understanding.
mission.detail: By combining AI and UX, we identify users' emotional states and provide appropriate interfaces and content. We believe technology doesn't have to be cold.

userCentric.title: User-Centric
userCentric.description: Every decision is based on user experience.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We solve problems and create value in new ways.

empathy.title: Empathy
empathy.description: We understand and empathize with the people behind the technology.

execution.title: Execution
execution.description: We quickly realize and improve ideas.

team.title: Small but Strong Team
team.description: HUA Labs is a small team passionate about emotion AI, UX design, and frontend development. We work together towards one goal, leveraging each person's expertise.
team.hiring: We're looking for colleagues to grow with us. If you're interested, please contact us anytime.
